mapper.insert:
insert into t_leads
id,
course_type,
course_name,
type_id,
student_id,
parent_id,
source_id,
channel_id,
stage_id,
status_id,
orgnization_id,
executive_id,
creator_id,
create_time,
last_update,
note,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orgnizationId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{executiveId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_leads
course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage_id = #{stageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgnization_id = #{orgnizationId,jdbcType=CHAR},
executive_id = #{executiveId,jdbcType=CHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.course_type, l.course_name, l.type_id, l.source_id, l.student_id, l.parent_id, l.channel_id, l.stage_id, l.status_id, l.orgnization_id, l.executive_id, l.creator_id, l.create_time, l.note, s.name AS student_name, s.gender_id, s.birthday, s.class_grade, s.school_name, p.name AS parent_name, p.cellphone, p.weichat, p.address, p.relation, uc.c_realname AS creator_name, ue.c_realname AS executive_name, src.name AS source_name, a.name AS channel_name, stage.name AS stage_name, status.name AS status_name, o.c_name AS orgnization_name from t_leads AS l LEFT JOIN t_leads_student AS s ON s.id = l.student_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_parent AS p ON p.id = l.parent_id LEFT JOIN t_user AS uc ON uc.c_id = l.creator_id LEFT JOIN t_user AS ue ON ue.c_id = l.creator_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_source AS src ON src.id = l.source_id LEFT JOIN t_activity AS a ON a.id = l.channel_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_stage AS stage ON stage.id = l.stage_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_status AS status ON status.id = l.status_id LEFT JOIN t_org AS o ON o.c_id = l.orgnization_id where l.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT l.id, l.course_type, l.course_name, l.type_id, l.source_id, l.student_id, l.parent_id, l.channel_id, l.stage_id, l.status_id, l.orgnization_id, l.executive_id, l.creator_id, l.create_time, l.note, s.name AS student_name, s.gender_id, s.birthday, s.class_grade, s.school_name, p.name AS parent_name, p.cellphone, p.weichat, p.address, p.relation, uc.c_realname AS creator_name, ue.c_realname AS executive_name, src.name AS source_name, a.name AS channel_name, stage.name AS stage_name, status.name AS status_name, o.c_name AS orgnization_name FROM t_leads AS l LEFT JOIN t_leads_student AS s ON s.id = l.student_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_parent AS p ON p.id = l.parent_id LEFT JOIN t_user AS uc ON uc.c_id = l.creator_id LEFT JOIN t_user AS ue ON ue.c_id = l.creator_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_source AS src ON src.id = l.source_id LEFT JOIN t_activity AS a ON a.id = l.channel_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_stage AS stage ON stage.id = l.stage_id LEFT JOIN t_leads_status AS status ON status.id = l.status_id LEFT JOIN t_org AS o ON o.c_id = l.orgnization_id WHERE l.orgnization_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND l.type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: id, course_type, course_name, type, source, channel, stage, status, orgnization_id, executive_id, creator_id, create_time, note
